attributes.additional_details: Because its so unfair many people don't watch the BBC I am sure that people would vote to remove the BBC station
attributes.background: We are the only country in the world that pay to watch TV and many people don't want the BBC anymore

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum on the TV licence fee: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629355

It is also not true that the UK is the only country in the world to have a TV licence. You can find out about TV licences across the world here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Television_licence
